* Diana looked out at the sand dunes and decided that she really 
didn't like it all that much. There was too much sand and it itched 
when it got in the fur. Plus, there were all types of icky bugs and 
stuff!
She nearly jumped out of her pelt when Rion yelled and pointed off 
towards the north, looking in the direction he pointed and remembered 
something her mother had taught her to remember North South, East and 
West.
West= water
South= sun'
East= evergreens
North= never ending snow!

Diana shivered.*

" But there's snow that way! We'll get cold!"

* Diana trotted towards the south west.*

" Let's go this way instead.*
